title: Enforce maximum HH budget cap on pledges

requirements.summary: Display remaining HH budget in PledgeSection and prevent pledges that exceed the project's maximum HH budget
acceptanceCriteria: The pledge input field shows the maximum allowed value (remaining HH budget).
Submitting a pledge amount greater than the remaining budget is blocked in the UI with a visible error message.
The remaining budget is recalculated and displayed correctly after each new pledge is approved or added.
When the project has no remaining HH budget, the pledge form is disabled and shows a 'Budget fully pledged' message.

file_operations.description: Calculate and display the remaining HH budget (project.estimatedTotalHH minus project.totalPledgedHH). Add validation to the pledge form that prevents submission when the entered amount exceeds the remaining budget. Show an inline error message when the user attempts to exceed the remaining budget. Disable the pledge form entirely when remaining budget is zero or negative, displaying 'Budget fully pledged' message. Update the UI to prominently show the remaining budget available for pledging near the pledge input field.
